name: Norwood
0:
”Alexa, TURN ON smart light”
”Alexa, SET dimmer to 80%”
”Alexa, TURN OFF smart light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can use the skill to control Norwood smart devices in your house.

To get started, select the "Enable" button in the Alexa app to link your Norwood account and say, "Alexa, find my devices." After successfully account linking you can say,

Alexa, TURN ON smart light.

Alexa, TURN OFF AC.

Unlike any other smart home technology, Norwood provides unique experience for your smart home. Our switches, dimmers and video door phones comes with various designs and options in modular format. Also it doesn't need any special wiring or centralized hub to operate Norwood devices. Norwood products just snugs into your wall and get connected with your home router with a few easy steps. Once after it is connected with your home router, you can control all the appliances in your home from anywhere in this globe. Also you can schedule scenes based on your life-style. 

* Schedule your music player and Wake up with your favorite music playing.
* Make sure your geyser is ready when you finish your coffee.
* No more thoughts like "Oh God!! Did i switch off the AC while leaving ?"

Norwood makes your life easier and Alexa is the cherry on the top. It assists you control everything without even using your mobile phone.
